bibl.title: Letter from Theophanes to Anysios.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Hermopolis, early IV. Letter from Theophanes to his son with instructions about getting men ἐν ἀναχωρήσει registered.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Ryl. IV, 626 + P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. II 69 = P. Bagnall 55
J. David Thomas, Letter from Theophanes to Anysios.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 311-316, 1 fig.
Hermopolis, early IV. Letter from Theophanes to his son with instructions about getting men ἐν ἀναχωρήσει registered.
